code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import"./ProfileInfo.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProfileInfo=function ProfileInfo(_ref){var playerInfo=_ref.playerInfo;var option={year:"numeric",month:"long",day:"numeric"};var lang=useSelector(function(state){return state.appState.lang;});var _playerInfo$totalGame=playerInfo.totalGames,won=_playerInfo$totalGame.won,draw=_playerInfo$totalGame.draw,lost=_playerInfo$totalGame.lost;var totalMatches=won+draw+lost;var joinDate=new Date(playerInfo.join).toLocaleDateString(lang==="English"?"us-US":"vi-VI",option);var lastOnlineDate=new Date(playerInfo.lastOnline).toLocaleDateString(lang==="English"?"us-US":"vi-VI",option);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"join profile-info-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-user-plus ",style:{marginLeft:"9px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item-title",children:lang==="English"?"Joined":"Tham Gia"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item-value",children:joinDate})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"last-online profile-info-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-signal "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item-title",children:lang==="English"?"Last Online":"Lần Cuối Online"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item-value",children:lastOnlineDate})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"games profile-info-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-chess-board "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item-title",children:lang==="English"?"Games":"Trận"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item-value",children:totalMatches>1000000?"1000000+":totalMatches})]})]});};export default ProfileInfo;
